comments.body:
i think that run snippet button need unregister first and run again, will be better. Right now, if i change that code must reloadui to make code work.


> Posted by CurseForge user lsjyzjl

That is intended. Its a DogTag issue, not a TMW issue (and it really isn't an issue since it is intended). TMW's code snippets feature has no knowledge of what the code it is running does - it just runs it. It is up to the code inside it to run properly.

Because of the way that I wrote that snippet (and there really isn't a better way to do it without coming up with an overly-elaborate system), you will need to reload your UI each time you make changes do it because of the way that everything is scoped together. Even if the beginning part runs just fine up until the DogTag registration, it still won't update the properly scoped reference to the variable that is used in the DogTag, so it won't work correctly.

TL;DR: It is intended that a UI reload be necessary each time you make changes because of the way this particular code works.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
